      DivideAndTopNPeaks(com.compomics.util.experiment.massspectrometry.Spectrum expSpectrum, int topN)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DivideAndTopNPeaks

        public DivideAndTopNPeaks(com.compomics.util.experiment.massspectrometry.Spectrum expSpectrum,
                          int topN)
        This constructs an object to filter out spectra based on 100Da window and it selects X peaks with highest intensities for each window.
        Parameters:
        expSpectrum - is an experimental spectrum
        topN - is picked peak numbers with highest intensities

      • DivideAndTopNPeaks

        public DivideAndTopNPeaks(com.compomics.util.experiment.massspectrometry.Spectrum expSpectrum,
                          int topN,
                          double windowMassSize)
        This constructs an object with a given window size instead of a default value. The default window size is 100Da
        Parameters:
        expSpectrum - is an experimental spectrum
        topN - is picked peak numbers with highest intensities
        windowMassSize - size of window, based on this a given spectrum is divided into smaller parts.
